languages.text: "Осторожнее, Караэль". {n}Голос Маражая приобретает бархатные нотки.{/n} "Ты вот-вот оскорбишь кабал Опустошительной бури, заявив, что тот, к кому он приполз на коленях за помощью, слишком низок для такой просьбы. Ты уверен в своих словах?"

"Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее, Караэль". {n}Голос Маражая приобретает бархатные нотки.{/n} "Ты вот-вот оскорбишь кабал Опустошительной бури, заявив, что тот, к кому он приполз на коленях за помощью, слишком низок для такой просьбы. Ты уверен в своих словах?"

traits.locale_text: "Be careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the man you crawled to beg for help is unworthy of lending you aid. Are you sure you can afford that?"

"Be careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the man you crawled to beg for help is unworthy of lending you aid. Are you sure you can afford that?"

"Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

"Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

"Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

languages.text: "Vorsichtig, Kharael." {n}Marazhais Stimme wird zu einem grollenden Schnurren.{/n} "Ihr lauft Gefahr, die Kabale des plündernden Sturms zu beleidigen, indem Ihr andeutet, der Drukhari, den Ihr auf den Knien um Hilfe angefleht habt, sei einer solchen Bitte unwürdig. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das tun wollt?"
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: "Vorsichtig, Kharael." {n}Marazhais Stimme wird zu einem grollenden Schnurren.{/n} "Ihr lauft Gefahr, die Kabale des plündernden Sturms zu beleidigen, indem Ihr andeutet, der Drukhari, den Ihr auf den Knien um Hilfe angefleht habt, sei einer solchen Bitte unwürdig. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das tun wollt?"

languages.text: “说话当心点，卡瑞尔。”{n}玛拉斋压低了声音，发出了低沉的喉音。{/n}“你这等于是在说，你正在屈膝恳求的黑暗灵族不配得到你的请求。这相当于是在侮辱狂风阴谋团，你确定你要这么做吗？”
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: “说话当心点，卡瑞尔。”{n}玛拉斋压低了声音，发出了低沉的喉音。{/n}“你这等于是在说，你正在屈膝恳求的黑暗灵族不配得到你的请求。这相当于是在侮辱狂风阴谋团，你确定你要这么做吗？”

languages.text: « Attention, Kharael. » {n}La voix de Marazhai n'est plus qu'un grondement sourd.{/n} « Vous êtes sur le point d'insulter la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse en prétendant que le Drukhari dont vous suppliez l'aide à genoux est indigne de cette demande. Êtes-vous sûr de vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: « Attention, Kharael. » {n}La voix de Marazhai n'est plus qu'un grondement sourd.{/n} « Vous êtes sur le point d'insulter la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse en prétendant que le Drukhari dont vous suppliez l'aide à genoux est indigne de cette demande. Êtes-vous sûr de vous ? »

languages.text: «Cuidado, Kharael». {n}La voz de Marazhai es un ronroneo estruendoso.{/n} «Estás a punto de insultar a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora afirmando que el Drukhari cuya ayuda has suplicado de rodillas es indigno de tal petición. ¿Seguro que es lo que quieres hacer?».
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuidado, Kharael». {n}La voz de Marazhai es un ronroneo estruendoso.{/n} «Estás a punto de insultar a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora afirmando que el Drukhari cuya ayuda has suplicado de rodillas es indigno de tal petición. ¿Seguro que es lo que quieres hacer?».

languages.text: 「気をつけな、カラエル」{n}マラズハイの声は低くゴロゴロと響く。{/n}「お前がひざまずいて助けを求めたデュカーリに、そんな要求はふさわしくないなどと言ってリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団を侮辱しようとしているんだぞ。お前は本当にそうしたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: 「気をつけな、カラエル」{n}マラズハイの声は低くゴロゴロと響く。{/n}「お前がひざまずいて助けを求めたデュカーリに、そんな要求はふさわしくないなどと言ってリーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団を侮辱しようとしているんだぞ。お前は本当にそうしたいのか？」

languages.text: "Dikkatli ol Kharael." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, içten içe gürleyen bir mırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Diz çökerek yardımını dilediğin Drukhari'nin böylesi bir talebe layık olmadığını iddia ederek, Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'na hakaret etmek üzeresin. Bunu yapmak istediğine emin misin?"
languages.original_text: "Careful, Kharael." {n}Marazhai's voice drops to a rumbling purr.{/n} "You are about to insult the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest by claiming that the Drukhari whose aid you begged on bended knee is unworthy of such a request. Are you sure you wish to do that?"

traits.locale_text: "Dikkatli ol Kharael." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, içten içe gürleyen bir mırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Diz çökerek yardımını dilediğin Drukhari'nin böylesi bir talebe layık olmadığını iddia ederek, Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'na hakaret etmek üzeresin. Bunu yapmak istediğine emin misin?"
